messages:
Of course... it's the magical Troy Donockley (Bad Shepherds, Nightwish) on Uillean pipes and Low Whistle! Congrats JF Bergeron, you win. Here's me introducing Troy:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iDhiegQLrDA Troy Donockley to guest on Ayreon The Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the next musician on the new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. It's the magical Troy Donockley (Bad Shepherds, Nightwish) on U...

No surprises here! Yes... the Prodigy himself... Tommy Karevik from Kamelot and Seventh Wonder in the lead role! Congrats Wolfgang Kuhn, you win. here is Tommy introducing himself and some behind the scenes material.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SSsm4JUyF-4 Tommy Karevik to guest on Ayreon The Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the seventh and final singer on the new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. Finally... it's the amazing Tommy Karevik of Kamelot...

Ah, controversy! No, not Candice, not Judith....it'sssssss.... Sara Squadrani from Ancient Bards... what a discovery! Congrats Isabella Zed, you win. Meet Sara herself and enjoy some of her singing in the studio here:

http://youtu.be/yLPWh3GzEbA Sara Squadrani to guest on Ayreon The Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the next singer on the new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. It's the lovely and talented Sara Squadrani from Ancient Bards!

That was easy! Without a doubt, it's the characteristic voice of John Wetton (Asia, King Crimson, UK) himself! Congrats Henrik Kokholm, you win. Here is me introducing John and some behind the scenes stuff:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=psrN65MpaOk John Wetton to guest on Ayreon The Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the next singer on the new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. It's the legendary John Wetton (Asia, King Crimson, UK) himself!

Many good guesses, well done! It's indeed Steve Hackett, the man who was involved in the best Genesis albums and who is still flying the flag for prog! Congrats Landon Strange, you win. Here is what I have to say about Steve: 

http://youtu.be/rex5nEinjb4 Steve Hackett to guest on Ayreon The Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the only guest guitar player on the new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. It's none other than... Steve Hackett, the man who w...

Cool, huh? Yes indeed, all the way from Australia: it's the incredible Michael Mills from Toehider! Congrats Andreas Hinterreiter, you win. Here's Michael introducing himself and some extreme silliness :-)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8zi0uSw2pn8 Michael Mills to guest on Ayreon Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the next singer for the new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. All the way from Australia... it's the amazing voice of Michael ...

No doubt about it... of course this was Jordan Rudess! Congrats Pierre Bondat, you win. Here are some words about Jordan:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CGZJHYpSozU Jordan Rudess to guest on Ayreon Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the third keyboard player for new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. Yes indeed... it's the virtuoso Jordan Rudess from Dream T...

Guess that wasn't so hard! Of course... it's the wonderfully distinctive voice of Cristina Scabbia! Congrats Игорь Ройзман, you win. Here's the charismatic lady introducing herself, and some behind the scenes material:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DK8d3PURCg0 Cristina Scabbia to guest on Ayreon Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the next singer for new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. It's the lovely and talented Cristina Scabbia of Lacuna Coil!

Wow...opinions are divided this time, I like it :-) But yeah, I'm proud to announce that it is indeed... the fabulous Rick Wakeman! Congrats Sven Schornstein, you win. Hear me rave about Rick here:

http://youtu.be/uSqMrzZxdz0 Rick Wakeman to guest on Ayreon Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces the second guest keyboardist on the new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. It's the legendary Rick Wakeman!

Wow...you guys are good :-) Yes, it was indeed the amazing JB of Grand Magus! Congrats Antti Kovanen - you win. Here is JB introducing himself and some 'behind the scenes' footage: 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QgdlYvwKzrE&feature=youtu.be JB (Grand Magus) to guest on Ayreon Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces another guest vocalist for new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. It's JB of Grand Magus!

Hmm...I guess 'a few of you' seem to know who this amazing singer is :-) Congrats Jacob Sernheim, you're the randomly chosen winner! So here is a video greeting...from Marco Hietala himself! 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gEc6ch6mPPw Marco Hietala guests on Ayreon Theory of Everything Arjen Lucassen announces first guest vocalist for new Ayreon album, The Theory of Everything. It's MARCO HIETALA of Nightwish and Tarot.

Here's the last guessing contest for now! A real magician, this time...can you name the musician, his current band and the two instruments you hear in this sample?
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S92aGFdl7Ec Guess the musician and his instruments - Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the very last 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! A real magician, this time...can you name the musician, his current band and the...

And finally, the seventh and last vocalist for you to guess! Who is this incredible singer?

http://youtu.be/p-NSTJafPDs Guess the vocalist 7 - New Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the next 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! Who is this incredible singer? We'll randomly pick a winner from the right answers on...

The second female singer... who is this talented young lady singing here?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MIbm9WMVHXM Guess the vocalist 6 - New Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the new 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! Who is this talented young lady singing here? We'll randomly pick a winner from the ri...

It just doesn't stop :-) Here's another renowned prog musician! So... who is this singer?

http://youtu.be/IdI3cLWN7AA Guess the vocalist 5 - New Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the new 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! Which renowned prog musician is singing here? We'll randomly pick a winner from the ri...

More dreams are coming true for me, just listen to this... who is this guitar player?

http://youtu.be/-6JGj7pBbMs Guess the guitar player - Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the new 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! Who is this legendary guitar player? We'll randomly pick a winner from the right answe...

Okay...be prepared for a stunning performance! Who is this singer?

http://youtu.be/SIP74WyBFYc Guess the vocalist 4 - New Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the new 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! Who is this stunning vocalist? We'll randomly pick a winner from the right answers on ...

Third and last keyboard player to guess... but definitely not the least! So... who played this spine-chilling synthesizer solo?

http://youtu.be/3XZEGiXhEaM Guess the keyboard player 3 - Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the new 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest. This is the last keyboard player to guess... but definitely not the least! So... who p...

And here is the first female singer... which lovely lady sings here?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aZVMzGgSQ_A Guess the vocalist 3 - New Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the new 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! It's a female singer this time, so... which lovely lady is singing here? We'll randoml...

Watch out, new contests coming at you every day now! Here is the second keyboard player. Who is playing piano and synthesizer here?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e_TQwf6sceU&feature=youtu.be Guess the keyboard player 2 -Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the new 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! Here is the second keyboard player. Who is playing piano and synthesizer here? We'll r...

Mystery Ayreon guest number 3... who is this singer on the new Ayreon? The answer tomorrow, good luck! 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MHGrie0G8pQ&feature=youtu.be Guess the vocalist 2 - Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the second 'guess this vocalist on the new Ayreon album' contest! So...who is this singer? We'll randomly pick a winner from the right answers on Fac...

Here is the second 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! So...who is this legendary keyboard player? We'll randomly pick a winner from the right answers here on Facebook and send some goodies. The answer will be tomorrow, hope you like it! 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nOv2Rt4-4VM Guess the keyboard player 1 -Ayreon Theory of Everything Here is the second 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! So...who is this legendary keyboard player? We'll randomly pick a winner from the r...

Here is the first 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! So...who is this singer? We'll randomly pick a winner from the right answers here on Facebook and send some goodies. The answer will be tomorrow...enjoy! 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ysGXzUykNE Guess the vocalist 1 - Ayreon "The Theory of Everything" Here is the first 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon album' contest! So...who is this singer? We'll randomly pick a winner from the right answers on Face...

Finally...I'm basically ready with the new Ayreon album! Just in time for a release this year, I'm happy to say. So...expect the 'guess this musician on the new Ayreon' contest to start any time now :-)

Arjen Anthony Lucassen Lost In The New Real It's A Real Outstanding Concept Album & Magnificent Artwork & Thanks For Makeing Such Wonderful Music From Your Fan Mark In Phoenix Arizona In North America Now I Can't Wate For New Ayreon The Theory Of Everything

Contest time again :-) The first one here to guess at least 10 band references in the video clip of Pink Beatles in a Purple Zeppelin, wins a rare Pink Beatles promotional single! 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wx3by7ZaaZA Pink Beatles in a Purple Zeppelin Pink Beatles in a Purple Zeppelin by Arjen Anthony Lucassen from the album "Lost in the New Real" (2012) 3D Beetle-Zeppelin-Cloud sequences by JALO Album Art...

The groovy video clip for Pink Beatles in a Purple Zeppelin is up! Hope you'll enjoy this amazing flight, peace and cosmic love to you all! :-) 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wx3by7ZaaZA Pink Beatles in a Purple Zeppelin Pink Beatles in a Purple Zeppelin by Arjen Anthony Lucassen from the album "Lost in the New Real" (2012) 3D Beetle-Zeppelin-Cloud sequences by JALO Album Art...

It's AMAZING how many good reactions and reviews my solo album got, way beyond my wildest expectations! Thanks all :-) Here's a link to some of the many positive online reviews we found so far. http://www.arjenlucassen.com/content/reviews-lost-in-the-new-real/

Hi all, just letting you know that my new solo album is streamed here for a week: 
http://www.guitarworld.com/arjen-lucassen-streaming-new-album-lost-new-real

Finally...here's a FULL SONG for you from my new solo album! Very curious to read your thoughts :-)

Hi friends of Arjen, Lori here...in case anyone missed it, here's a new video where Arjen explains the concept behnid his new solo album: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LZMDWdkFf9g The concept behind Arjen Lucassen's 'Lost in the New Real' Arjen Lucassen talks about the concept behind his new solo album, "Lost in the New Real." Signed preorders are available at http://store.arjenlucassen.com/ne...

Thanks for all the birthday wishes, 52 years old now...damn! And I enjoyed reading all your nice comments on the new album trailer, glad so many of you have such a broad taste :-) Here's more of me babbling about the concept. 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LZMDWdkFf9g
 The concept behind Arjen Lucassen's 'Lost in the New Real' Arjen Lucassen talks about the concept behind his new solo album, "Lost in the New Real." Signed preorders are available at http://store.arjenlucassen.com/ne...

Okay then...this is a scary moment...the trailer of my new solo album! All ME, lots of ME :-)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hVJSvW80CyU
 Arjen Lucassen's Lost in the New Real Trailer Trailer for Arjen Lucassen's forthcoming solo album, "Lost in the New Real." To be released by InsideOut / Century Media on 23 April (Europe) and 8 May (USA)...

Finally...you can pre-order my new solo album in our store now! With lots of goodies if you're fast :-) And tomorrow we will feature the trailer with the previews, I'm already nervous...

The solo album frontcover artwork, the album title, the cast...and some music! 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dURitBUQsXs Arjen Lucassen's Lost in the New Real cover poster See the poster made from the cover artwork of Arjen Lucassen's forthcoming solo album, Lost in the New Real. To be released by Inside Out Music on 23 April (...

Well, that was easy... of course it’s the one and only Sir Russell Allen completing the cast! And once again he proves he’s up there with the best. The winner is Foteini Elric, please send me a personal message here. One more musician to guess after this, you can listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

Yes of course.... this is indeed the insurmountable Tommy Karevik of Kamelot and Seventh Wonder... amazing, huh? He already brought me to tears on Theory of Everything, but this really exceeds my wildest expectations, he’s definitely showing his full potential here! The winner is Kaitlin Kino, please send me a personal message here. You can listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

Wait for it... this is actually the amazing Marcel Coenen! He already proved to me how good he is with the Theater Equation, but this solo is beyond good... He recorded this last week right before my eyes in my studio, otherwise I would have never believed it! The winner is Stefan Kessels, please send me a personal message here. Stay tuned for more, and listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Marcel Coenen Marcel Coenen Timeline Photos

Absolutely, this is of course Zaher Zorgati from the great Tunisian band Myrath. I’ve enjoyed Myrath for years, so I’m glad to have Zaher on my album. I’m sorry to say it’s just a small part this time, but the future is wide open! The winner is Julian Hahn, please send me a personal message here. Stay tuned for more, and listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

Yes indeed... it’s the great Mark Kelly from the mighty Marillion! I really love the wonderful melodies and the dreamy sound, I’m honored to have Mark on the album! The winner is Terje Tiberius Mork, please send me a personal message here. Stay tuned for more next week, and listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

Oh yes indeed, it’s Nils K. Rue from the fantastic Norwegian band Pagan’s Mind! I’ve been wanting to work with Nils for years, I’m glad it finally happened. Great job, Nils! The winner is Denisa Varcholova, please send me a personal message here. Stay tuned for more in a few days, and listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

You’re so right, it’s indeed the mighty Michael Eriksen of the great Circus Maximus! Cool voice huh? So great to finally work with him, and we had so much fun :-) The winner is Sarah Miranda, please send me a personal message here. Stay tuned for more, and listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Michael Eriksen sings on the new Ayreon album

That's right, it’s my favorite rival Tobias Sammet of Avantasia and Edguy. And what an amazing job he did! I’m thrilled to have finally found the perfect role for him on an Ayreon album. The winner is Mike Sarlo, please send me a personal message here. More musicians to guess next week! Listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

Yes indeed, this is the amazing Guthrie Govan (The Aristocrats, Steven Wilson)! Lori and I got tears in our eyes when we heard it for the first time... He’s undoubtedly one of the hottest guitar players in the world at the moment, and I’m honored to have him on my album! The winner is Mark David Perry, please send me a personal message here. Listen to the previous musicians here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

No doubt about it, it’s indeed the monumental Hansi Kürsch from Blind Guardian! Not only an extremely powerful singer, but also one of the nicest guys I’ve worked with. The winner is Erik Hoffmann, please send me a personal message here. More musicians to guess next week! Follow the PROGress here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

Haha, controversy! But... indeed it’s the amazing Floor Jansen of Nightwish! (Photo by Andrea Beckers) And once again she managed to impress me, this was undoubtedly the best recording session I ever did with her. The winner is Mike Platvoet, please send me a personal message here. Listen to the guest musicians so far here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Floor Jansen sings on the new Ayreon album

Many good guesses, indeed it’s the incredible Paul Gilbert! Undoubtedly one of the most influential guitar players in the world, so you can imagine how honored I am to have him on this album. The winner is Hasan Arsin, please send me a personal message here. Another singer to guess this week! Follow the PROGress here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

Way too easy again, of course it’s the enchanting Simone Simons of the mighty Epica! I’m so glad that this time I could give her a much bigger part than she had on 01011001, she did an amazing job! The winner is Jeremy A Lasda, please send me a message here. More musicians to guess next week! Follow the PROGress here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

Well that was clearly quite easy again, indeed it’s Tommy Rogers of the amazing Between the Buried and Me! I totally love his solo albums as Thomas Giles, and I’m really excited having him on this album. The winner is Cecil Palmer, please send me a message here. Next singer to guess in a few days! Follow the PROGress here: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ Timeline Photos

I know, that was an easy one to start with! Of course it was the amazing James LaBrie. I’m so proud having his warm emotive voice on Ayreon again! The winner is Andreas Berglund, please send me a personal message here. Next week there will be more singers to guess. You can follow the PROGress of the new album here on this special page we made: http://www.arjenlucassen.com/ay8/ James Labrie Timeline Photos

The last guessing game! So yeah... this dude was apparently brave enough to play some guitar as well next to all these amazing guitar gods... Kind of an anti-climax I’d say. You can guess who it is... but hey, who cares? :-) New Ayreon album: guess the last musician # 5

Guess the LAST singer #12! And so it’s come to this... after this amazing all-star cast, the album wouldn’t be complete without this world class singer. Can you guess even before listening? New Ayreon album: guess the LAST singer #12
Guess the singer #11. Holy crap... ladies and gentlemen... I present you – in my opinion - one of the best singers in the world right now... Here it goes! New Ayreon album: guess the singer #11
Guess the musician #4. Brace yourself for this guitar solo, I was blown away... tears in my eyes, really! Can you guess who this is? New Ayreon album: guess the musician #4
Guess the singer #10. For those of you who know him and his unique band, this will not be difficult! New Ayreon album: guess the singer #10
Guess the musician #3. It’s prog time! Which keyboard player plays this beautiful atmospheric synthesizer solo? Dream away! New Ayreon album: guess the musician #3
Time to get back to the guessing game, did you miss it as much as I did? :-) Guess the singer #9. Who is this powerhouse with the mighty, distinctive voice? New Ayreon album: guess the singer #9
Guess the singer #8. Who is this amazing singer? No clues this time... good luck guessing and most of all... enjoy! New Ayreon album: guess the singer #8
Guess the singer #7. This is the first time this powerful and distinctive voice has been on an Ayreon album. Who is this mighty metal icon? New Ayreon album: guess the singer #7

Guess the musician #2. This must be one of the best solos I ever had on Ayreon... who is this guitar player, perfectly merging emotion, virtuosity and melody coupled with a great sound? New Ayreon album: guess the musician #2
Guess the singer #6. Who is this huge unmistakable voice, sounding majestic as ever? New Ayreon album: guess the singer #6
Time to guess singer #5! Who is this remarkable lady blowing us away with her all-powerful vocals? New Ayreon album: guess the singer #5
Here is singer #4 on the new Ayreon album... who is this extraordinary talent? Brace yourselves... and prepare to be AMAZED! New Ayreon album: guess the singer #4
Let’s make it a bit harder... this time you have a guitar player to guess! Who is this virtuoso playing this mind-blowing solo on the new Ayreon album? New Ayreon album: Guess guitar player #1
Guess singer #3 on the new Ayreon album! Who is this lovely lady with the beautiful voice? Enjoy! New Ayreon album: guess the singer #3
It’s time to guess singer #2! A singer I haven’t worked with before. Good luck and I hope you enjoy it! New Ayreon album: guess the singer #2

Yesssss, the guessing game has started again! Your chance to win some goodies and hear some (demo) snippets of the new Ayreon album. Who is this singer? Instructions are in the video. Good luck and I hope you enjoy the music so far! New Ayreon album - Guess the singer #1

Stream of Passion stopt

Groot nieuws uit het Stream Of Passion kamp: de band gaat er mee stoppen! Na elf jaar en vier studioalbums vinden de dame en heren het tijd voor verandering. Stream Of Passion werd in 2005 opgericht door Arjen Lucassen, nadat hij met zangeres Marcela Bovio had samengewerkt op het Ayreon-album The Human Equation. Kalender: Tom S. Englund (Evergrey)

Vandaag (maandag 14 december) viert Tom S. Englund zijn 42ste verjaardag. De Zweed is vooral bekend als zanger/gitarist van de progmetalband Evergrey. Daarnaast leverde de vocalist onder meer een gastbijdrage aan het Ayreon-album 01011001 en diverse cd's van Nightrage. Ter ere van Tom Englunds verjaardag delen we vandaag de door hem geschreven Evergrey-track A Touch Of Blessing uit 2004. Evergrey-"A Touch of Blessing" This is a video from the melodic metal band Evergrey. Most of my videos are death metal but this one I decided to put up to show what else I am into. Enjoy!

Kalender: Joost van den Broek (ex-After Forever)

Vandaag viert Joost van den Broek, docent aan het Conservatorium van Amsterdam, zijn 33ste verjaardag. Ondanks zijn jonge leeftijd is de kans groot dat je een of meer albums in de kast hebt staan waarbij de naam van Van den Broek bij de credits vermeld staat. Het bekendst is hij onder metalfans als de voormalige toetsenist en co-songwriter van After Forever. Verder werkte Joost als toetsenist, orkestleider, engineer of producent mee aan albums van onder meer Ayreon, Cirrha Niva, Epica, HDK, MaYaN, Nemesea, PYRAMAZE, ReVamp, Star One, Stream of Passion, Sun Caged, The Gentle Storm en Xandria. Een indrukwekkend rijtje en we zijn benieuwd wat daar allemaal nog bij gaat komen. Ter ere van Van den Broeks verjaardag delen we vandaag de videoclip van Energize Me, een van de bekendste songs die hij schreef en opnam met After Forever. Van harte proficiat, Joost van den Broek!

Uno de sus mejores trabajos, en esta obra conceptual se narra la historia de una raza alienígena tecnológicamente muy avanzada llamada Forever, que vive en el planeta Y (01011001, en binario) y que, habiendo llegado a su límite evolutivo, decide enviar su ADN a a la Tierra mediante un cometa para empezar de nuevo.

H. P. Lovecraft passed away on March 15th 1937. 

78 years to the day later, ANTHROPIA pays tribute to him and releases "Non-Euclidean Spaces", concept album based on Cthulhu Mythos, featuring Arjen Anthony Lucassen (Ayreon, Star One, The Gentle Storm) and Edu Falaschi (ex-Angra, Almah). Artwork by David Demaret (official).

It is available on all digital platforms, and on Digipak on our site Adarca : http://lc.cx/jCW

Here is the opening track of the album, to give you an idea of the first steps of Randolph Carter's journey. Enjoy!

PS: For our Kickstarter backers : we send the last pre-orders tomorrow, you should receive it soon :)
--------

H.P. Lovecraft s'est éteint le 15 mars 1937.

78 ans plus tard, jour pour jour, Anthropia lui rend hommage et sort "Non-Euclidean Spaces", concept album basé sur le mythe de Cthulhu, avec Arjen Lucassen (Ayreon, Star One, The Gentle Storm) et Edu Falaschi (ex-Angra, Almah). Artwork par David Demaret.

L'album est disponible sur toutes les plateformes numériques et en Digipak sur notre site Adarca : http://lc.cx/jCW

Voici l'opening track de l'album, pour vous donner une idée du début de voyage de Randolph Carter. Bonne écoute!

PS : Pour nos backers de Kickstarter : nous envoyons les dernières précommandes demain, réception très bientôt donc :) ANTHROPIA - Strange Aeons & The Melancholy of R.C. (Non-Euclidean Spaces) ANTHROPIA - Strange Aeons & The Melancholy of R.C. (Non-Euclidean Spaces) Featuring Arjen Anthony Lucassen Band : ANTHROPIA Album : Non-Euclidean Spaces Song...

Here is "Credits", the single of the new ANTHROPIA album "Non-Euclidean Spaces" based on H. P. Lovecraft's writings, featuring Arjen Anthony Lucassen (Ayreon, Star One, The Gentle Storm,…) and Edu Falaschi (ex-Angra, Almah).

It's the only song of the album that get off Cthulhu Mythos a bit, drawing a parallel with cinema to conclude the album : we all have a role to play on Earth, even if it's sometimes about self-sacrifice for the good of mankind, as Randolph Carter experiments in this concept album… It's also the most accessible song of the album, and we hope that you'll appreciate its "in-your-face" and groovy side!

Enjoy and share, thanks!

Voici "Credits", le single du nouvel album d'Anthropia "Non-Euclidean Spaces", basé sur les écrits de Lovecraft, et avec Arjen Lucassen (Ayreon, Star One, The Gentle Storm,…) et Edu Falaschi (ex-Angra, Almah).

C'est le seul titre qui s'éloigne un peu du Mythe de Cthulhu en proposant un parallèle avec le 7ème art pour conclure l'album : Nous avons tous notre rôle à jouer sur cette Terre, même si parfois il s'agit de se sacrifier dans l'ombre pour le bien de l'humanité, à l'image de Randolph Carter dans ce concept album… C'est le morceau le plus accessible de l'album, et on espère que vous apprécierez son côté "groovy" et pêchu !

Hey guys, stoked to let you know that I'll be playing Devin Townsend and Mike Baker's parts in the stage production of the Ayreon album "The Human Equation"

"The Theater Equation" will run for 4 very special performances in Rotterdam in September, and features James LaBrie from Dream Theater, Anneke van Giersbergen, Heather Findlay, lots and lots of amazing talent. 
The characters "Rage" (originally Devin Townsend on the album), and "Father" (originally the late, great Mike Baker from Shadow Gallery) will be combined into one part. This is the second "Father" role in the Ayreon canon for me!!

"01011001" is the seventh studio album by Arjen Anthony Lucassen's long-running Ayreon project. "01011001" is the binary representation of the ASCII value of the letter Y.

Seventeen singers in total (including Lucassen himself) contributed to the album, more than any other Ayreon album. Of these, except Lucassen, only Anneke Van Giersbergen (ex- theGathering) and Floor Jansen (After Forever and Nightwish) have sung on previous Ayreon albums: Van Giersbergen on Into the Electric Castle, Jansen on The Dream Sequencer.

It also stars, among others, Bob Catley from Magnum, Hansi Kürsch from Blind Guardian, Jorn Lande, Jonas Renkse  and Steve Lee from Gotthard  in his final guest appearance before his death in 2010. The album was a commercial and critical success.

From "01011001", we bring for you today "We are forever", an amazing song with two beautiful voices: Anneke Van Giersbergen and Jonas Renkse.

~ Racing heart

A big thanks to everyone who came to see Anneke and me on our acoustic tour! It was truly an emotional roller coaster ride for this hermit. The 11 shows went very well and lots of venues were actually sold out, the audiences were absolutely fantastic and gave us the warmest welcome we could wish for. The chemistry between Anneke, me and the crowd felt just perfect. However ... I’m afraid this doesn't necessarily mean I’m going to take up touring again. I’m not sure yet if the advantages (seeing the crowd’s happy faces, meeting them and of course the playing) outweigh the disadvantages (travelling, lack of sleep, endless waiting, back pain and anxiety). I must say that Anneke definitely pulled me through this, she’s so positive and optimistic and a true professional! And of course the enthusiastic reactions of the audiences helped too, I’m truly honored and moved. In the end I’m glad I did it, and am actually kinda proud of myself :-) I hope you will all enjoy The Gentle Storm album and the upcoming shows! Timeline Photos

“The Gentle Storm” concept album will be a double CD, with the same songs on each CD but in VERY different, contrasting arrangements. CD1, the “Gentle”album, will be all acoustic and folky with lots of exotic instruments. CD2, the “Storm”album, will be an all-out, bombastic orchestral metal album. Of course there are plenty of progressive elements mixed in as well. Questions? Ask away! Timeline Photos

We recorded bass guitar with Johan van Stratum for The Gentle Storm album. Old Stream of Passion times revisited, and Johan got even better! We recorded all his parts in just one afternoon. And of course it wouldn't be complete without the usual batch of silly childish pictures :-) Photos from Ayreon's post

We’ve been recording piano for The Gentle Storm with Joost van den Broek. Once more this true virtuoso impressed the hell out of me!
